name: ExplainTool
description: Provides an explanation using all the accumulated context from previous tools. Use this as the final step after gathering information with other tools like GlobTool, GrepTool, and FileReadTool.

query.description: The specific question or topic to explain based on the gathered context

name: Task
description: Create a multiple subtask for general AI assistance, analysis, or processing. Use this if the query is too complex to handle with the other tools alone.

description.description: The task description or query for the AI to process

name: Bash
description: Execute a bash command on the system

name: FileReadTool
description: Read the contents of a file. Often follows GlobTool or GrepTool to examine specific files discovered during a search.

file_path.description: The absolute path to the file to read

limit.description: Optional: The maximum number of lines to read

offset.description: Optional: The line number to start reading from (0-based)

name: FileEditTool
description: Edit the contents of a file by replacing text

file_path.description: The absolute path to the file to edit

old_string.description: The text to replace. Must be exact including whitespace

new_string.description: The new text to insert in place of old_string

name: LSTool
description: List files and directories at a specified path

path.description: The absolute path to the directory to list

name: GlobTool
description: Find files matching a glob pattern. Typically used as a first step before more specific operations (like reading files or searching within them).

path.description: Optional: The directory to search in

name: GrepTool
description: Search for content in files using regular expressions. Works well after using GlobTool to narrow down which files to search within.

pattern.description: The regex pattern to search for in file contents (e.g., 'function\s+main', 'import\s+React')

path.description: Optional: The directory to search in
